p: A mixture of the required compound 4 (2 mmol) and metformin hydrochloride (2 mmol) in glacial acetic acid (20 ml) was heated under reflux at 120 °C for 4–8 h (completion of the reaction was monitored by TLC). The solvent was then removed under reduced pressure. The crude products were purified by silica gel column chromatography using dichloromethane:methanol (20:1) as the eluent.
